channel.title: Maximum 10 players ~*~Help Please~*~
channel.description:
Ok my server begins to lag at 8-10 players and I palready posted a topic about it and found out that my computer is just junk. So I was wondering if anyone knew how to make it to where only 10 players can log onto my server and then anyone else who tried it would read "World Full" Or something like that. PatrickFTW was suppose to show it to me or something but never did.
Im not sure if this is right section but I know you don't request in tutorial section so if I posted in wrong section im sorry please forgive me. :(
But ill be [b]HIGHLY[/b] greatful to anyone who can help me.
Thanks in advance.
